solution_line_template: He dances for {daily_dance_duration_per_session}*{daily_dance_sessions}=<<{daily_dance_duration_per_session}*{daily_dance_sessions}={total_daily_dance_hours}>>{total_daily_dance_hours} hour per day
So he burns {dancing_calories_per_hour}*{total_daily_dance_hours}=<<{dancing_calories_per_hour}={calories_per_day}>>{calories_per_day} calories per day
So he burns {calories_per_day}*{dance_days_per_week}=<<{calories_per_day}*{dance_days_per_week}={calories_per_week}>>{calories_per_week} calories per week
